quizDescription.text:
Answer the following questions.Write the correct option in the textbox.

For Linear Regression model select the correct option : (note: N is the units of dependent variable) 5 * Â½ = 2.5

questionText.text:
SSE

a. Depends on N
b. Normalized by N
c. Predicts same outcome
d. captures value added from using linear regression model
e. Sum of all (RSS at each leaf ) +S (S is the number of splits)

RMSE

a. Depends on N
b. Normalized by N
c. Predicts same outcome
d. captures value added from using linear regression model
e. Sum of all (RSS at each leaf ) +S (S is the number of splits)

Baseline model

a. Depends on N
b. Normalized by N
c. Predicts same outcome
d. captures value added from using linear regression model
e. Sum of all (RSS at each leaf ) +S (S is the number of splits)

R^2 (R Square)

a. Depends on N
b. Normalized by N
c. Predicts same outcome
d. captures value added from using linear regression model
e. Sum of all (RSS at each leaf ) +S (S is the number of splits)

Complexity parameter (CP)

a. Depends on N
b. Normalized by N
c. Predicts same outcome
d. captures value added from using linear regression model
e. Sum of all (RSS at each leaf ) +S (S is the number of splits)
